attributes.action: make the Railway National Fares Manual available online to the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The National Fares Manual is currently only available by ordering a CD-ROM, Which contains fare details to and from all Railway Stations in Great Britain.

This CD-ROM is produced 3 times a year at the cost of £14.67 (£44.01 Annually). This information should be made freely available to the general public as it is to staff via a ATOC website.

National Rail enquiries website does not always show the cheapest fare unless you know what you are looking for and the National Fare's Manual provides this information for you.
